name: Trivia Vault: Super Heroes Trivia
description: Welcome to the Trivia Vault contestant! Play as a contestant in a gameshow called Trivia Vault Super Heroes Trivia and bring your thinking hat. Answer super hero trivia questions as quickly as you can, the faster you answer the higher the cash value.
minimum_requirements: OS: Win 7 32-bit or higher Processor: 2.0 ghz or higher Memory: 500 MB RAM Graphics: 500 Megs VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space
